instr_decoder_i.rs1_ready.name: rs1_ready
instr_decoder_i.rs1_ready.explanation: Internal handshake signal derived from register validity, can be safely gated

instr_decoder_i.rs2_ready.name: rs2_ready
instr_decoder_i.rs2_ready.explanation: Internal handshake signal derived from register validity, can be safely gated

instr_decoder_i.rs3_ready.name: rs3_ready
instr_decoder_i.rs3_ready.explanation: Internal handshake signal for optional third port, can be safely gated

instr_decoder_i.sel.name: sel
instr_decoder_i.sel.explanation: Instruction selection signal, protected by assertion, can be gated with care

ex_stage_i.lsu_i.store_buffer_empty.name: store_buffer_empty
ex_stage_i.lsu_i.store_buffer_empty.explanation: Status signal indicating store buffer empty state, can be monitored without affecting core functionality

ex_stage_i.lsu_i.itlb_miss_o.name: itlb_miss_o
ex_stage_i.lsu_i.itlb_miss_o.explanation: Performance counter signal for instruction TLB misses, purely for monitoring

ex_stage_i.lsu_i.dtlb_miss_o.name: dtlb_miss_o
ex_stage_i.lsu_i.dtlb_miss_o.explanation: Performance counter signal for data TLB misses, purely for monitoring

ex_stage_i.lsu_i.commit_ready_o.name: commit_ready_o
ex_stage_i.lsu_i.commit_ready_o.explanation: Handshake signal indicating commit queue readiness, can be safely modified with logic gates
